title: Lokomotiv Moscow apologizes for discriminatory chants
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Russian football club Lokomotiv Moscow issued an apology Friday after its fans chanted discriminatory slogans during a Europa League game. ï¿½...
